# Tuko tayari (Mwanga Band)

# Links

  • Youtubeopen in new window

  • Spotifyopen in new window

# Lyrics

Tuko tayari, Kuona miujiza *3
(We are ready to witness miracles)

Mimi niko tayari, Kuona miujiza
(I am ready to witness miracles)

Yako Mungu *2
(Your miracles, God)

Miujiza Yako Mungu *2
(Your miracles, God)

--- Instrumental Interlude

Mahali hapa, Pamelowa upako *4
(This place is flooded with anointing)

Wako Mungu *4
(Your anointing, God)

[Repeat]

--- Instrumental Interlude

Now we worship You
You alone are King of Kings *3

--- Instrumental Interlude

Now we worship You
You alone are King of Kings *4

You rule with power
With an iron sceptre
You're eyes are fire
And full of love
For Me *3

Now we worship You
You alone are King
